item.title: CVE-2024-31285|2024-06-04T17:36:07.467Z -- tooltip -- wordpress%20tooltips
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tooltip WordPress Tooltips allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Tooltips: from n/a through 9.5.3.
